Articles.Content: Hurrah! It took me a while, considering i've been here exactly 3 months already! Time flies when you're having fun, I love this forum. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I haven't been here for more than a 1 and a half months, and I have a lot of posts. Anyways, congratulations!
that means you get repped moar than 20 times a post on average?
Each rep comment adds more than one point of rep, for new users it adds two points, and it gradually increases to a maximum of five.
